CSS Classes.addClass: Adds a CSS class to the specified element.
CSS Classes.removeClass: Removes a CSS class from the specified element.
CSS Classes.toggleClass: Toggles a CSS class on/off for the specified element.

Attributes.getAttribute: Retrieves the value of the specified attribute for the given element.
Attributes.removeAttribute: Removes the specified attribute from the given element.

Traversal.getParent: Returns the parent element of the specified element.
Traversal.getNextSibling: Returns the next sibling element of the specified element.
Traversal.getPreviousSibling: Returns the previous sibling element of the specified element.

Ajax/HTTP Requests.makeFetchRequest: Performs a Fetch API request to the specified URL using the given HTTP method and invokes the callback with the response data.
